attributes.action: Ban the use of Fireworks in residential areas - enforcable by law
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ban the use of Fireworks in residential areas which is noisy, annoying, frightning for animals, dangerous and spoils the enjoyment that people are entitled to. To be enforcable by at least a £1000 on the spot fine.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
